title: Japan Seizes Chinese Fishing Boat; Move Likely to Add to Tensions
summary_full: The seizure of the trawler, which Japan said was sailing in its waters in the East China Sea, is likely to add to tensions between Tokyo and Beijing.
summary_public: The seizure of the trawler, which Japan said was sailing in its waters in the East China Sea, is likely to add to tensions between Tokyo and Beijing.
